title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.1 - Definition of medical service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.1 - Definition of medical service

State Regulations

Medical service, as it relates to children and youth with special health care needs, means such diagnostic, therapeutic and rehabilitative care by medical and paramedical personnel, including hospital and related care, and drugs, prostheses, appliances, equipment and devices, as necessary. Notes

ยง
46.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 12, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 19, eff. 5/12/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
